shows.title: Marky Jay’s Monkey Magic Show
shows.desc:
A rip-roaring kids’ show aimed at the under-10s. Full of amazing circus, kids’ participation, puppetry and banana-based magic, the Monkey Magic show has been performed hundreds of times to thousands of children and is always a guaranteed hit.

Marky Jay is a Bristol-based variety artist and one of the city’s top children’s entertainers.
